attributes.action: I implore that the UK withdraws from all sporting contact with Russia.
attributes.additional_details: We must send a further message to the whole of Russia that we will not play “sport” with them whilst they are murdering innocent Ukrainian citizens.
attributes.background: Sanction against all sporting contact with Russia including its clubs, teams and athletes.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about participation in sporting events are a matter for their organisers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
